title: 'Very fragile stopped working after two months. Blue light disappeared'

Some kind of current spark noise used to come, the USB slots don't charge my mobile or any other device efficiently..not even ring light. title: 'Lifesaver for me'
body: The Portronics Power Plate 5 has been an absolute lifesaver for me! When I returned from the US with a charger that didn't fit into Indian sockets, I was in a bind. This power converter came to the rescue.  Not only does it have 3 AC sockets that accommodate various types of plugs, but it also boasts 3 USB ports, which is incredibly convenient for charging multiple devices simultaneously. The 1500W power capacity ensures that I can power all my devices without any issues.  What sets this converter apart is the thoughtful addition of a mobile holder, making it a versatile and practical accessory. The 1.5-meter cord length gives me flexibility in placing it where I need it most.  Overall, the Portronics Power Plate 5 has simplified my charging needs and provided a reliable solution for my US chargers in India. It's a must-have for travelers and anyone dealing with different plug types. Highly recommended! üëçüîå
